thread.title: Maged Elkomy
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Maged Elkomy

author: Maged Elkomy
title: Maged Elkomy
text: Hello, this is not the first time to buy sunglasses from yours, I had too many experiences before I think u have my history, just received my doir sunglasses and also faces same issue i had before I think this issue is only with Dior, the sunglasses is unbalanced and twisted, I had one before and has the same issue and also send an email for this, just received apologizes, and we will take care next time, happened the same
